Time: Check-in begins at 8:30 am. Program runs from 9:00 am to 4:30 pm.
EventMakeChecksOutTo: NoVA North Odyssey of the Mind
EventMailBody:
Thank you for being an Odyssey coach!

You are registered for:

Coaches Training in NoVA South (Region)
  • Location: Location
  • Date: Date
  • Time: Time

    • Please remember to bring the following:

    • Lunch (we will provide beverages),
    • a copy of the Years Program Guide (available at ProgramGuide),
      • VirginiaHandbook
    • A check for $Fee made payable to "MakeChecksOutTo". CoordinatorsDoNotPay

    We look forward to seeing you there.

    If you have any questions or need to discuss anything regarding your registration,contact RegionalDirectorEmail.

You have been assigned Judge ID JudgeID

Congratulations, your judge registration is complete.  Please print this page for your records.

Our system has registered you with the following information:

  • Judge ID: JudgeID
  • First Name: FirstName
  • Last Name: LastName

Should a coach request that you be a judge for their team, please provide them with all of this information.  Please do not give out your ID number to more than one team since you may only judge on behalf of ONE team.

As a reminder, you have agreed to attend the following two events:

  • Region Region Odyssey of the Mind Judges Training

    • Location: JudgesTrainingLocation
    • Date: JudgesTrainingDate
    • Time: JudgesTrainingTime
  • Region Region Odyssey of the Mind Tournament

    • Location: TournamentLocation
    • Date: TournamentDate
    • Time: TournamentTime

In February, you will receive information about Judges Training which will include the problem you have been assigned to and any other information that you will need.

We will serve breakfast on the morning of Judges Training, including coffee and juice.  Breakfast typically consists of bagels and muffins.  You will need to bring a packed lunch to Judges Training.  At the tournament, we will provide breakfast and lunch for judges.

If you have any questions or find you cannot attend either judges training or the tournament, please use our Contact Us page to reach the Judges Coordinator.

If you agreed to judge on behalf of a team and find that you cannot attend either Judges Training or the tournament, you must contact the coach and advise him/her so that the team knows they need to find another judge.

We invite you to explore our web site at www.novanorth.org to learn more about Odyssey of the Mind and the NoVA North Region. A good starting point are these two brief videos:

  • A Creative Experience (http://www.novanorth.org/wp/?page_id=2827)
  • The Basics of the Program (http://www.novanorth.org/wp/?page_id=2913)

Our NoVA North Regional Board has a few openings for those who would like to become more involved.  Please contact our Regional Director through our Contact Us page if you are interested or would like further information.

You have been assigned Judge ID JudgeID

You have been assigned Volunteer ID VolunteerID.

Congratulations, your volunteer registration is complete.  Please print this page for your records.

Our system has registered you with the following information:

  • Volunteer ID: VolunteerID
  • First Name: FirstName
  • Last Name: LastName

Our Volunteer Coordinator will reach out to you in late January/early February to clarify your scheduled volunteer time and assignment.

Volunteers will be responsible for their own breakfast and lunch at the tournament.

Should a coach request that you be a volunteer for their team, please provide them with all of this information.  Please do not give out your ID number to more than one team since you may only volunteer on behalf of ONE team.

As a reminder, you have agreed to attend the following event:

  • Region Region Odyssey of the Mind Tournament

    • Location: TournamentLocation
    • Date: TournamentDate
    • Time: TournamentTime

If you have any questions or find you cannot attend the tournament, please use our Contact Us page to reach the Volunteer Coordinator.

If you agreed to volunteer on behalf of a team and find that you cannot attend the tournament, you must contact the coach and advise him/her so that the team knows they need to find another volunteer.

We invite you to explore our web site at www.novanorth.org to learn more about Odyssey of the Mind and the NoVA North Region. A good starting point are these two brief videos:

  • A Creative Experience (http://www.novanorth.org/wp/?page_id=2827)
  • The Basics of the Program (http://www.novanorth.org/wp/?page_id=2913)

Our NoVA North Regional Board has a few openings for those who would like to become more involved.  Please contact our Regional Director through our Contact Us page if you are interested or would like further information.

EventMailBody:
You have been assigned Team ID TeamID

Dear Coach CoachLastName,

You have registered the team listed below.  Your judge is listed below, as well.  Please remind your judge that the team is counting on him or her to attend both Judges Training and the Regional Tournament.

We recommend that you print this page and keep it for your records.  If you need to change any information that you entered during your registration, please send an e-mail to the Webmaster for this site and include your Team ID # from this registration.

For this registration to be complete, the treasurer must receive payment of the team’s EventCost FriendlyRegistrationName fee no later than PaymentDueDate .  Payment must be by check, made out to "EventMakeChecksOutTo", and mailed to the address below.  Please put your team ID number (see top of this page) on the check.  If your team’s FriendlyRegistrationName fee is being paid as one of a group of teams (for example, the school PTA is paying for all teams) be sure to advise your school coordinator of your team’s ID number so that all team ID numbers can be included on the group check.

Mail your payment to:

EventPayeeName
EventPayeeAddress1
EventPayeeAddress2
EventPayeeCity, EventPayeeState EventPayeeZipCode

You may also contact the Treasurer from our Contact Us page.

Please do not request a receipt from the Treasurer.  Your cancelled check is your payment receipt.

Thanks for signing up!
